isosensitivity: ISO 200 - 6400; can also be set to approx. 1 EV above ISO 6400 (ISO 12800 equivalent)
exposurecompensation: Can be adjusted by -5 - +5 EV in increments of 1/3 EV in P, S, A, and M modes
monitor: 7.5-cm (3-in.), approx. 921k-dot (VGA)  TFT LCD with 170 ° viewing angle, approx. 100% frame coverage,  and brightness adjustment
accessoryterminal: Wireless remote controllers:  WR-1, WR-R10 (available separately) Remote cords: MC-DC2 (available  separately) GPS units: GP-1/GP-1A (available separately)
focuslock: Focus can be locked by pressing shutter-release button halfway (single-servo AF) or by pressing AE-L/AF-L button
flashreadyindicator: Lights when built-in flash or optional flash unit is fully charged; flashes after flash is fired at full output
compatiblelenses: Autofocus is available with  AF-S and AF-I lenses. Autofocus is not available with other type G and D  lenses, AF lenses (IX NIKKOR and lenses for the F3AF are not  supported), and AI-P lenses. Non-CPU lenses can be used in mode M, but  the camera exposure meter will not function. The electronic rangefinder  can be used with lenses that have a maximum aperture of f/5.6 or faster.
flashfunctions: Auto Flash, Fill-in Flash, Flash Off, Red-eye Reduction Flash
audioinput: Stereo mini-pin jack (3.5mm diameter); supports optional ME-1 stereo microphones
mode: Auto modes (auto; auto, flash off);  programmed auto with flexible program (P); shutter-priority auto (S);  aperture-priority auto (A); manual (M); scene modes (portrait;  landscape; child; sports; close up; night portrait); special effects  modes (night vision; super vivid; pop; photo illustration; color sketch;  toy camera effect; miniature effect; selective color; silhouette; high  key; low key; HDR painting; easy panorama)
exposurelock: Luminosity locked at detected value with AE-L/AF-L button
accessoryshoe: ISO 518 hot-shoe with sync and data contacts and safety lock
weight: Approx. 460 g (1 lb 0.2 oz) with battery and memory card but without body cap; approx. 410 g/14.5 oz (camera body only)
flashmode: Auto, auto with red-eye reduction,  auto slow sync, auto slow sync with red-eye reduction, fill-flash,  red-eye reduction, slow sync, slow sync with red-eye reduction,  rear-curtain with slow sync, rear-curtain sync, off
meteringmode: TTL exposure metering using 420-pixel RGB sensor
suppliedaccessories: EN-EL14a rechargeable  Li-ion battery (with terminal cover), MH-24 battery charger, DK-25  rubber eyecup, BF-1B body cap, AN-DC3 strap, UC-E17 USB cable, EG-CP14  audio/video cable, ViewNX 2 CD-ROM
isosensitivityrecommendedexposureindex: ISO  100-12800 in steps of 1 EV. Can also be set to approx. 1 EV (ISO 25600  equivalent) above ISO 12800; auto ISO sensitivity control available
flashcontrol: TTL: i-TTL flash control using  420-pixel RGB sensor is available with built-in flash and SB-910,  SB-900, SB-800, SB-700, SB-600, SB-400, or SB-300; i-TTL balanced  fill-flash for digital SLR is used with matrix and center-weighted  metering, standard i-TTL flash for digital SLR with spot metering
effectiveangleofview: Approx. 1.5x that of lenses with FX format angle of view
builtinflash: Auto, portrait, child, close up,  night portrait, super vivid, pop, photo illustration, color sketch, toy  camera effect: Auto flash with auto pop-up P, S, A, M: Manual pop-up  with button release
metering: TTL exposure metering using main image sensor
afareamode: Face-priority AF, wide-area AF, normal-area AF, subject-tracking AF
dustreductionsystem: Image sensor cleaning, Image Dust Off reference data (optional Capture NX 2 software required)
releasemode: Single frame, continuous, quiet shutter release, self-timer, delayed remote; ML-L3, quick-response remote; ML-L3
focusingscreen: Type B BriteView Clear Matte Mark VII screen
supportedlanguages: Arabic, Bengali, Bulgarian,  Chinese (Simplified and Traditional), Czech, Danish, Dutch, English,  Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian,  Japanese, Korean, Marathi, Norwegian, Persian, Polish, Portuguese  (Portugal and Brazil), Romanian, Russian, Serbian, Spanish, Swedish,  Tamil, Telugu, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
shutterflashsyncspeed: X=1/200 s; synchronizes with shutter at 1/200 s or slower
framesizepixelsandframerate: 1920 x 1080,  60p (progressive)/50p/30p/25p/24p, high/normal 1280 x 720, 60p/50p,  high/normal 640 x 424, 30p/25p, high/normal Frame rates of 30p (actual  frame rate 29.97 fps) and 60p (actual frame rate 59.94 fps) are  available when NTSC is selected for video mode. 25p and 50p are  available when PAL is selected for video mode. Actual frame rate when  24p is selected is 23.976 fps.
automaticsceneselection: Available in auto and auto (flash off) modes
frameadvancerate: Up to 5 fps Note: Frame  rates assume manual focus, manual or shutter-priority auto exposure, a  shutter speed of 1/250 s or faster, and other settings at default  values.
nikoncreativelightingsystemcls: Advanced  Wireless Lighting supported with built-in flash, SB-910, SB-900, SB-800,  or SB-700 as a master flash and SB-600 or SB-R200 as remotes, or SU-800  as commander; Flash Color Information Communication supported with  built-in flash and all CLS-compatible flash units
media: SD (Secure Digital) and UHS-I compliant SDHC and SDXC memory cards
playback: Full-frame and thumbnail (4, 9, or 72  images or calendar) playback with playback zoom, movie playback, photo  and/or movie slide shows, histogram display, highlights, auto image  rotation, and image comment (up to 36 characters)
dimensionswxhxd: Approx. 124 x 98 x 75.5 mm (4.9 x 3.9 x 3 in.)
autofocus: Contrast-detect AF anywhere in frame  (camera selects focus point automatically when face-priority AF or  subject-tracking AF is selected)
lensservo: Autofocus (AF): Single-servo AF (AF-S); full-time servo AF (AF-F)Manual focus (MF)
focuspoint: Can be selected from 11 focus points
picturecontrolsystem: Standard, Neutral, Vivid, Monochrome, Portrait, Landscape; selected Picture Control can be modified
imagesizepixels: Easy panorama mode: 4800 x  1080 (normal, horizontal pan) 1632 x 4800 (normal, vertical pan) 9600 x  1080 (wide, horizontal pan) 1632 x 9600 (wide, vertical pan) Other  modes: 6000 x 4000 (Large) 4496 x 3000 (Medium) 2992 x 2000 (Small)
eyepoint: 18 mm (-1.0 m-1; from center surface of viewfinder eyepiece lens)
acadapter: EH-5b AC adapter; requires EP-5A power connector (available separately)
rangeiso100f14lens20c68f: Matrix or center-weighted metering: 0-20 EV Spot metering: 2-20 EV
audiorecordingdevice: Built-in monaural or external stereo microphone; sensitivity adjustable
whitebalance: Auto, incandescent, fluorescent  (7 types), direct sunlight, flash, cloudy, shade, preset manual, all  except preset manual with fine-tuning.
